title: How do I set a call ringtone for an individual contact or a contact group?
answer:
Call ringtones cannot currently be set for contact groups. 

 If you wish to set a call ringtone for a contact, go to the contact's details page, select Phone ringtone and then select and apply a preloaded ringtone or a music file stored on the phone.
keywords: contacts, groups, contact specific ringtone, ringtone, custom ringtone, configure, change
